title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When selecting Close All Saved from the file menu in the latest UI code in build 20020508, not all saved files are closed.
EB: When selecting Close All Saved from the file menu, all saved files should be closed.
SR:
1. Open a few files in the application.
2. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'.
3. Select Close All Saved from the file menu.
